entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 15.
